resources.string: RefundPal is the new way of staying true to your tax refund spending goals.

string-array.name: question1
string-array.item: What are your goals for your Tax Refund?

string-array.name: question3
string-array.item: Do you want to commit part of your tax refund to saving for %s?

string-array.name: question5
string-array.item: Congrats! Setting a goal is the first step torwards financial security. We'll let you know when your refund arrives

string-array.name: question6
string-array.item: Do you want to hear from us about other opportunities to save for your %s fund?

string-array.name: refund1
string-array.item: You just got a federal tax refund of %f. In Junary, you committed to saving %d%% of your refund for your vacation. That's %f.

string-array.name: refund2
string-array.item: In the meantime, text 'SAVE' anytime to %s to make an additional deposit toward your %s fund
Click here to check your savings balance
